seeds.title: Seeds
seeds.description: The seed URL(s) to start crawling from. Multile seed URL must be separated by a comma (usually not needed, these are just the crawl seeds). First seed URL is used as ZIM homepage

seed_file.title: Seed File
seed_file.description: If set, read a list of seed urls, one per line. HTTPS URL to an online file.

lang.title: Browser Language
lang.description: If set, sets the language used by the browser, should be ISO 639 language[-country] code, e.g. `en` or `en-GB`

title.title: Title
title.description: Custom title for your ZIM. Defaults to title of main page

tags.title: ZIM Tags
tags.description: Single string with individual tags separated by a semicolon.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: Custom publisher name (ZIM metadata). openZIM otherwise

workers.title: Workers
workers.description: The number of workers to run in parallel. Defaults to 1

wait_until.title: WaitUntil
wait_until.description: Puppeteer page.goto() condition to wait for before continuing. One of load, domcontentloaded, networkidle0 or networkidle2, or a comma-separated combination of those. Default is load,networkidle2

extra_hops.title: Extra Hops
extra_hops.description: Number of extra 'hops' to follow, beyond the current scope. Default is 0

page_limit.title: Page Limit
page_limit.description: Limit crawl to this number of pages. Default is 0 (no-limit).

max_page_limit.title: Max Page Limit
max_page_limit.description: Maximum pages to crawl, overriding pageLimit if both are set. Default is 0 (no-limit)

page_load_timeout.title: Page Load Timeout
page_load_timeout.description: Timeout for each page to load (in seconds). Default is 90

scope_type.title: Scope Type
scope_type.description: A predfined scope of the crawl. For more customization, use 'custom' and set scopeIncludeRx/scopeExcludeRx regexes. Default is custom if scopeIncludeRx is set, prefix otherwise.

scope_include_rx.title: Scope Include Regex
scope_include_rx.description: Regex of page URLs that should be included in the crawl (defaults to the immediate directory of seed)

scope_exclude_rx.title: Scope Exclude Regex
scope_exclude_rx.description: Regex of page URLs that should be excluded from the crawl

allow_hash_urls.title: Allow Hashtag URLs
allow_hash_urls.description: Allow Hashtag URLs, useful for single-page-application crawling or when different hashtags load dynamic content

mobile_device.title: As device
mobile_device.description: Device to crawl as. See Pupeeter's Device.ts for a list

select_links.title: Select Links
select_links.description: One or more selectors for extracting links, in the format [css selector]->[property to use],[css selector]->@[attribute to use]

click_selector.title: Click Selector
click_selector.description: Selector for elements to click when using the autoclick behavior. Default is 'a'

block_rules.title: Block Rules
block_rules.description: Additional rules for blocking certain URLs from being loaded, by URL regex and optionally via text match in an iframe

block_message.title: Block Message
block_message.description: If specified, when a URL is blocked, a record with this error message is added instead

block_ads.title: Block Ads
block_ads.description: If set, block advertisements from being loaded (based on Stephen Black's blocklist). Note that some bad domains are also blocked by zimit configuration even if this option is not set.

ad_block_message.title: Ads Block Message
ad_block_message.description: If specified, when an ad is blocked, a record with this error message is added instead

user_agent_suffix.title: User Agent Suffix
user_agent_suffix.description: Append suffix to existing browser user-agent. Defaults to +Zimit

use_sitemap.title: Sitemap URL
use_sitemap.description: Use as sitemap to get additional URLs for the crawl (usually at /sitemap.xml)

sitemap_from_date.title: Sitemap From Date
sitemap_from_date.description: If set, filter URLs from sitemaps to those greater than or equal to (>=) provided ISO Date string (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS or partial date)

sitemap_to_date.title: Sitemap To Date
sitemap_to_date.description: If set, filter URLs from sitemaps to those less than or equal to (<=) provided ISO Date string (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS or partial date)

behavior_timeout.title: Behavior Timeout
behavior_timeout.description: If >0, timeout (in seconds) for in-page behavior will run on each page. If 0, a behavior can run until finish. Default is 90.

post_load_delay.title: Post Load Delay
post_load_delay.description: If >0, amount of time to sleep (in seconds) after page has loaded, before taking screenshots / getting text / running behaviors. Default is 0.

page_extra_delay.title: Page Extra Delay
page_extra_delay.description: If >0, amount of time to sleep (in seconds) after behaviors before moving on to next page. Default is 0.

dedup_policy.title: Dedup Policy
dedup_policy.description: Deduplication policy. One of skip, revisit or keep. Default is skip

screenshot.title: Screenshot
screenshot.description: Screenshot options for crawler. One of view, thumbnail, fullPage, fullPageFinal or a comma-separated combination of those.

size_soft_limit.title: Size Soft Limit
size_soft_limit.description: If set, save crawl state and stop crawl if WARC size exceeds this value. ZIM will still be created.

size_hard_limit.title: Size Hard Limit
size_hard_limit.description: If set, exit crawler and fail the scraper immediately if WARC size exceeds this value

disk_utilization.title: Disk Utilization
disk_utilization.description: Save state and exit if disk utilization exceeds this percentage value. Default (if not set) is 90%. Set to 0 to disable disk utilization check.

time_soft_limit.title: Time Soft Limit
time_soft_limit.description: If set, save crawl state and stop crawl if WARC(s) creation takes longer than this value, in seconds. ZIM will still be created.

time_hard_limit.title: Time Hard Limit
time_hard_limit.description: If set, exit crawler and fail the scraper immediately if WARC(s) creation takes longer than this value, in seconds

net_idle_wait.title: Net Idle Wait
net_idle_wait.description: If set, wait for network idle after page load and after behaviors are done (in seconds). If -1 (default), determine based on scope.

origin_override.title: Origin Override
origin_override.description: If set, will redirect requests from each origin in key to origin in the value, eg. https://host:port=http://alt-host:alt-port.

max_page_retries.title: Max Page Retries
max_page_retries.description: If set, number of times to retry a page that failed to load before page is considered to have failed. Default is 2.

fail_on_invalid_status.title: Fail on invalid status
fail_on_invalid_status.description: If set, will treat pages with 4xx or 5xx response as failures. When combined with --failOnFailedLimit or --failOnFailedSeed may result in crawl failing due to non-200 responses

fail_on_failed_limit.title: Fail on failed - Limit
fail_on_failed_limit.description: If set, save state and exit if number of failed pages exceeds this value.

warcs.title: WARC files
warcs.description: Comma-separated list of WARC files to use as input.

keep.title: Keep
keep.description: Should be True. Developer option: must be True if we want to keep the WARC files for artifacts archiving.

output.title: Output folder
output.description: Output folder for ZIM file(s). Leave it as `/output`

admin_email.title: Admin Email
admin_email.description: Admin Email for crawler: used in UserAgent so website admin can contact us

profile.title: Browser profile
profile.description: Path or HTTP(S) URL to tar.gz file which contains the browser profile directory for Browsertrix crawler.

behaviors.title: Behaviors
behaviors.description: Which background behaviors to enable on each page. Defaults to autoplay,autofetch,siteSpecific.

depth.title: Depth
depth.description: The depth of the crawl for all seeds. Default is -1 (infinite).

zim_lang.title: ZIM Language
zim_lang.description: Language metadata of ZIM (warc2zim --lang param). ISO-639-3 code. Retrieved from homepage if found, fallback to `eng`

long_description.title: Long description
long_description.description: Optional long description for your ZIM

custom_css.title: Custom CSS
custom_css.description: URL to a CSS file to inject into pages

charsets_to_try.title: Charsets to try
charsets_to_try.description: List of charsets to try decode content when charset is not found

ignore_content_header_charsets.title: Ignore Content Header Charsets
ignore_content_header_charsets.description: Ignore the charsets specified in content headers - first bytes - typically because they are wrong.

content_header_bytes_length.title: Content Header Bytes Length
content_header_bytes_length.description: How many bytes to consider when searching for content charsets in header (default is 1024).

ignore_http_header_charsets.title: Ignore HTTP Header Charsets
ignore_http_header_charsets.description: Ignore the charsets specified in HTTP `Content-Type` headers, typically because they are wrong.

encoding_aliases.title: Encoding Aliases
encoding_aliases.description: List of encoding/charset aliases to decode WARC content. Aliases are used when the encoding specified in upstream server exists in Python under a different name. This parameter is single string, multiple values are separated by a comma, like in alias1=encoding1,alias2=encoding2.

custom_behaviors.title: Custom Behaviors
custom_behaviors.description: JS code for custom behaviors to customize crawler. Single string with individual JS files URL/path separated by a comma.

zimit_progress_file.title: Zimit Progress File
zimit_progress_file.description: Scraping progress file. Leave it as `/output/task_progress.json`

replay_viewer_source.title: Replay Viewer Source
replay_viewer_source.description: URL from which to load the ReplayWeb.page replay viewer from

zim_file.title: ZIM filename
zim_file.description: ZIM file name (based on --name if not provided). Include {period} to insert date period dynamically
